statements: SELECT * FROM court_appearances;
SELECT case_id, date, time, location FROM court_appearances WHERE attorney_id = '123';
SELECT MAX(date) AS last_appearance_date FROM court_appearances;
SELECT attorney_id, COUNT(*) AS total_appearances FROM court_appearances GROUP BY attorney_id;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM court_appearances ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM court_appearances WHERE case_id = 123456 ORDER BY appearance_date DESC;
SELECT case_id, lawyer_name, appearance_date FROM court_appearances WHERE lawyer_name LIKE 'John%' AND outcome = 'In Progress';
SELECT lawyer_name, COUNT(*) AS appearances FROM court_appearances GROUP BY lawyer_name ORDER BY appearances DESC;
SELECT MAX(appearance_date) AS latest_appearance FROM court_appearances WHERE case_type = 'Child Custody';
SELECT CASE WHEN outcome = 'Resolved' THEN 'Case Closed' ELSE 'In Progress' END AS case_status FROM court_appearances WHERE case_id = 654321;
SELECT * FROM court_appearances;
SELECT appearance_id, date, time, location, judge FROM court_appearances WHERE case_id = '123456';
SELECT * FROM court_appearances WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT judge, location FROM court_appearances ORDER BY judge DESC, location ASC;
SELECT update_id, case_id, update_date FROM case_updates;
SELECT * FROM court_appearances;
SELECT case_id, date, time FROM court_appearances WHERE judge = 'Judge Smith';
SELECT * FROM court_appearances WHERE location = 'City Hall' ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT case_id, update_date, update_description FROM case_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM court_appearances WHERE judge IN ('Judge Smith', 'Judge Johnson');
SELECT * FROM CourtAppearances;
SELECT case_id, attorney_id, hearing_date FROM CourtAppearances ORDER BY hearing_date DESC;
SELECT case_id, outcome FROM CourtAppearances WHERE attorney_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM CaseUpdates WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT case_number, client_id, opposing_party_id FROM ChildCustodyCases WHERE case_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM CourtAppearances WHERE appearance_id = 1;
SELECT hearing_date, outcome FROM CourtAppearances WHERE case_id = 100 ORDER BY hearing_date DESC;
SELECT case_id, attorney_id, outcome FROM CourtAppearances WHERE outcome = 'Dismissed';
SELECT * FROM CaseUpdates WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01' ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT update_description, updated_by FROM CaseUpdates WHERE updated_by = 'John Doe' AND LENGTH(update_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM court_appearances;
SELECT case_id, lawyer_id, location FROM court_appearances WHERE outcome = 'Dismissed';
SELECT appearance_date, location FROM court_appearances ORDER BY appearance_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, specialization FROM lawyers WHERE specialization = 'Family Law';
SELECT child_name, parent1, parent2 FROM cases WHERE court_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM lawyers WHERE specialization = 'Criminal Law';
SELECT case_id, child_name, court_location FROM cases WHERE court_location = 'New York';
SELECT first_name, last_name, specialization FROM lawyers WHERE specialization = 'Family Law' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM court_appearances WHERE outcome = 'Guilty' OR outcome = 'Not Guilty';
SELECT case_id, update_date, update_details FROM case_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM court_appearances ORDER BY appearance_date DESC;
SELECT case_id, judge_name FROM court_appearances WHERE judge_name = 'Judge Smith';
SELECT attorney_name, specialization FROM attorneys WHERE specialization = 'Family Law';
SELECT * FROM child_custody_cases WHERE parent1_name = 'Alice' AND parent2_name = 'Bob';
SELECT judge_name, courtroom_number FROM judges ORDER BY judge_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM court_appearances WHERE judge_name = 'Judge Smith';
SELECT attorney_name, specialization FROM attorneys ORDER BY attorney_name DESC;
SELECT case_id, MAX(appearance_date) AS latest_appearance FROM court_appearances GROUP BY case_id;
SELECT judge_name, courtroom_number FROM judges WHERE judge_name LIKE '%Judge%';
SELECT parent1_name, parent2_name, current_status FROM child_custody_cases WHERE child_name = 'Emma' AND current_status = 'Ongoing';
